Package applicationObject

Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
applicationObject.ApplicationObject
applicationObject.Appointment
public class Appointment extends ApplicationObject
Represents an appointment within the scheduling application. This is retrieved from appointments table in DB Note: appointment = ap for naming

  • Constructor Details

    • Appointment

      public Appointment(String apTitle, String apType, String apLocation, int apID, String apDescription, LocalDateTime apStart, LocalDateTime apEnd, int apCustomerID, int apContactID, int apUserID)
      Appointment Constructor
      Parameters:
      apTitle - title of the appointment
      apType - type/category of the appointment
      apLocation - location of the appointment
      apID - unique identifier for the appointment
      apDescription - description of the appointment
      apStart - start date and time of the appointment
      apEnd - end date and time of the appointment
      apCustomerID - Id of the associated customer
      apContactID - Id of the associated contact
      apUserID - Id of the user associated with the appointment

    • getApContactName

      public String getApContactName() throws SQLException
      Getter method for contact name accessed from ContactDAO.
      Returns:
      The name of the contact.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the database query.

    • getApCustomerName

      public String getApCustomerName() throws SQLException
      Getter method for Customer name accessed from CustomerDAO.
      Returns:
      The name of the Customer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the database query.

    • isInBusinessHours

      public boolean isInBusinessHours()
      Checks if the appointment is within business hours.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment is within business hours; false otherwise.

    • isWithinOneDay

      public boolean isWithinOneDay()
      Checks if the appointment is within one day.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment is within one day; false otherwise.

    • isNotOverlapping

      public boolean isNotOverlapping() throws SQLException
      Checks if the appointment does not overlap with other appointments for the same customer. Lambda here is for iterating through the appointments to check for overlap.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment does not overlap; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the database query.

    • isComplete

      public boolean isComplete()
